#summary Quick guide for developers.

= Pre-Requirements =

 * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/pentaho/files/Business%20Intelligence%20Server/ Pentaho BI Platform] 3.7 or above should be installed.
 * [http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi Ant] is installed
 * Have an SVN client or plugin for you favourite IDE

= How to start =

To have the project deployed on your server:
 * Get the project from SVN [http://pentaho-fc-plugin.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/]
 * Configure the _pentaho.system_ variable in the _build.properties_ file. This variable should be configured with your Pentaho _solutions\system_ directory.
 * Run ant default target
 * Run ant _install-plugin_ target
